root.description: As you walk between the trees, the leaves blot out the sun and the fog closes in around you. Somehow it seems to thicken behind you and to give way in front of you.

exit.description: A pale glow shine to the west.
exit.detailedDescription: The glow in this direction may be sunlight.

prop.description: Some of the other children are nearby. They are moving west.
prop.detailedDescription: They look uneasy. Judging by their pace, they are eager to reach the light.
